apps.name: Delta Ignited
apps.subtitle: Retro games meet modern design.
apps.versionDescription:
New Features
• Local Multiplayer - Connect up to 4 controllers on supported consoles
• Save State Rewind - Rolling save states that can be rewinded to at any time
• Extended MFi Support - Add support for missing MFi inputs

v0.1.0
• Update Assets - New icons and more
• Update GBA Skin - New default gba skin
apps.localizedDescription:
Delta Ignited is an overhaul of Delta, an all-in-one emulator for iOS.

FEATURES

Supported Game Systems
â€¢ Nintendo Entertainment System
â€¢ Super Nintendo Entertainment System
â€¢ Nintendo 64
â€¢ Game Boy (Color)
â€¢ Game Boy Advance
â€¢ Nintendo DS

Controller Support
â€¢ Supports PS4, PS5, Xbox One S, Xbox Series X, and MFi game controllers.
â€¢ Supports bluetooth (and wired) keyboards, as well as the Apple Smart Keyboard.
â€¢ Completely customize button mappings on a per-system, per-controller basis.
â€¢ Map buttons to special â€œQuick Saveâ€, â€œQuick Load,â€ and â€œFast Forwardâ€ actions.

Save States
â€¢ Save and load save states for any game from the pause menu.
â€¢ Lock save states to prevent them from being accidentally overwritten.
â€¢ Automatically makes backup save states to ensure you never lose your progress.
â€¢ Support for â€œQuick Saves,â€ save states that can be quickly saved/loaded with a single button press (requires external controller or supported skin).
â€¢ Save State Rewind - Rolling save states that can be rewound to for up to 2 minutes. Configurable interval.

Cheats
â€¢ Supports various types of cheat codes for each supported system:
â€¢ NES: Game Genie
â€¢ SNES: Game Genie, Pro Action Replay
â€¢ N64: GameShark
â€¢ GBC: Game Genie, GameShark
â€¢ GBA: Action Replay, Code Breaker, GameShark
â€¢ DS: Action Replay

Delta Sync
â€¢ Sync your games, game saves, save states, cheats, controller skins, and controller mappings between devices.
â€¢ View version histories of everything you sync and optionally restore them to earlier versions.
â€¢ Supports both Google Drive and Dropbox.

Custom Controller Skins
â€¢ Beautiful built-in controller skins for all systems.
â€¢ Import controller skins made by others, or even make your own to share with the world!

Hold Button
â€¢ Choose buttons for Delta to hold down on your behalf, freeing up your thumbs to press other buttons instead.
â€¢ Perfect for games that typically require one button be held down constantly (ex: run button in Mario games, or the A button in Mario Kart).

Fast Forward
â€¢ Speed through slower parts of games by running the game much faster than normal.
â€¢ Easily enable or disable from the pause menu, or optionally with a mapped button on an external controller.

3D/Haptic Touch
â€¢ Use 3D or Haptic Touch to â€œpeekâ€ at games, save states, and cheat codes.
â€¢ App icon shortcuts allow quick access to your most recently played games, or optionally customize the shortcuts to always include certain games.

Game Artwork
â€¢ Automatically displays appropriate box art for imported games.
â€¢ Change a gameâ€™s artwork to anything you want, or select from the built-in game artwork database.

Misc.
â€¢ Gyroscope support (WarioWare: Twisted! only)
â€¢ Microphone support (DS only)
â€¢ Support for delta:// URL scheme to jump directly into a specific game.

**Delta Ignited and Lit Development are in no way affiliated with Nintendo. The name "Nintendo" and all associated game console names are registered trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.**

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.
